metadata.title: USN-6111-1 -- Flask vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Flask incorrectly handled certain data responses. An attacker could possibly use this issue to expose sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6111-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-flask-doc - 1.1.1-2ubuntu0.1 python3-flask - 1.1.1-2ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
